*div1 type="summary"* *p*M. A. Bryan to James F. Perry, February 1, 1834. Excitement over report of Austin's arrest.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="02-01-1834"> Feb. 1st*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dear *person_mentioned*Father*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*There has news arrived that that they have arrested *person_mentioned*Uncle */person_mentioned*at *location_mentioned*Saltillo */location_mentioned*it is a report but I fear it is to true they intend sending him back to *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*they accuse him of treason if they make it out that, I am fearfull it will go hard with him, there is a great deal of excitement about it in this place apply to *person_mentioned*Doct Miller*/person_mentioned* for the news as I send this by him. It is imposible to get teams here the engagements I made has all fallen through it is out of the question to hall they say. I cant say any more as my hands are so cold that I can scearsly hold my pen I send enclosed an order on *person_mentioned*Walter C White*/person_mentioned* for one hundred and twenty dollars and 29c which he will pay you in *location_mentioned*Brazoria */location_mentioned*times are dull owing to cold weather*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*M. A. Bryan*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Jones */person_mentioned*is going up the *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*in a few day with his *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*goods are very scarse here If you can get yours up now you could sell them right of, ther is scarsely anything to eat in *location_mentioned*San Felipe*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*M.A.B*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*I have paid *person_mentioned*Mr. Townsend */person_mentioned*the twenty dollars for Slate.*/p* *p*[Addressed.] *person_mentioned*Mr James F Perry*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Peach Point Brazos*/location_mentioned* per *person_mentioned*Doct Miller*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
